description: The course includes in-depth discussion of methodologies and strategies for cross-cultural research, including those informed by feminist perspectives and some of the current debates and controversies in relation to gender research across various disciplines within international frames across cultures, and within the context of rapid global change.
prerequisites: GEND1000 or GEND1010 and #6 of Women's Studies major courses
restricted: Course offering may be cancelled unless a minimum of 20 students enrol.
